body_html: This is incorrect. indices should not only be unique, but also be sorted in coalesced matrix for correct behavior of matrix multiplication. This raises a major issue when performing matrix multiplication with coalesced then transposed matrix. See #6219.
body_text: This is incorrect. indices should not only be unique, but also be sorted in coalesced matrix for correct behavior of matrix multiplication. This raises a major issue when performing matrix multiplication with coalesced then transposed matrix. See #6219.
body: This is incorrect. `indices` should not only be unique, but also be sorted in coalesced matrix for correct behavior of matrix multiplication. This raises a major issue when performing matrix multiplication with coalesced then transposed matrix. See https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/6219.
